page.title: 05PADSTOW CHURCH YOUTH CLUB
page.content: On Tuesday nights the Vicar holds a Quest Group for the younger members of the Church.The meeting starts at 6 o'clock and lasts for one hour.Firstly we have projects and drawings all about Jesus and other Bible stories. Some of us go into the Church to learn handbell ringing or the Vicar shows us around the Church explaining all about the different parts.Next we play games like table-tennis,snooker,draughts, cards and chasing games.Meetings end with Prayers. In the Summer we meet for swimming at the School Swimming Pool and sometimes we have barbecues on the beach.We also have a firework party in the Vicarage garden.At Christmas we join with the Sunday School and perform a Nativity Play in the Church.
